Robert Jordan, Southwest Airlines’ Next CEO

stories.text:
Looking for product, open source preferably, like Tooljet, retool, etc. but also lets you drop a widget into a customer facing app like a webapp that is password protect. The closest one I found might be Budibase.

I like the idea of building back end tools but sometimes that backend tool needs to be populated by end users on a webservice.

I'd like to be able to just drop it in as an embed widget or js code.

Anyone know anything like that?

Thanks
stories.title: Ask HN: Retool, Budibase, Tooljet alternative for enduser widgets?

stories.text:
Hello HN! I have been a software engineer for a little while. Recently, when building software I've been really annoyed with scheduling cron style background jobs especially in a node environment. So, I built this little side project in the past few days and would love some thoughts and some feedback.

Loophook runs hooks which can be scheduled using a cron string or a simple timestamp.
stories.title: Show HN: Loophook: Simpler Background Jobs
Software is crammed full of bugs. This 'exciting' project banishes most of them
